title: Lost in the woods!
content: Somebody please help me! I am lost in the woods have no way of getting out!
author: Tyler Burk

title: Can't find my cat!
content: The darn cat just ran away! What am I supposed to do!!!! I have to go looking for my cat, but I really need to sleep for work tomorrow. Going to do some heavy drinking to reflect on what I should do.
author: Will Smith

title: Where is my sock?
content: Lost my sock and cannot find it :(
author: Fred Lewis

title: Father is Lebron James?
content: My mother recently told me that my real father is Lebron James... I don't know what to think anymore...
author: Jason Bourne

title: Who stole my waffle maker?!?!?!?
content: My waffle maker was stolen and now I have no way of getting it back. I need help finding this individual!
author: Machel Myers
